name: CATransition
desc: An object that provides an animated transition between a layer's states.

items.name: var startProgress: Float
items.desc: Indicates the start point of the receiver as a fraction of the entire transition.

items.name: var endProgress: Float
items.desc: Indicates the end point of the receiver as a fraction of the entire transition.

items.name: var subtype: CATransitionSubtype?
items.desc: Specifies an optional subtype that indicates the direction for the predefined motion-based transitions.

items.name: var filter: Any?
items.desc: An optional Core Image filter object that provides the transition.
